definitions.definition: In various ball games , to move (with) the ball, controlling its path by kicking or bouncing it repeatedly.
To let saliva drip from the mouth ; to drool .
examples: The baby dribbled onto its bib.

definitions.definition: To fall in drops or an unsteady stream ; to trickle .
To let something fall in drips .
To live or pass one's time in a trivial fashion.
To perform a card flourish in which the cards fall smoothly from one's hand .

main_definition: ( basketball , soccer ) In various ball games , to move (with) the ball, controlling its path by kicking or bouncing it repeatedly.
secondary_definitions: To let saliva drip from the mouth ; to drool .
To fall in drops or an unsteady stream ; to trickle .
( intransitive ) To move or roll slowly.
( transitive ) To let something fall in drips .
( dated ) To live or pass one's time in a trivial fashion.
To perform a card flourish in which the cards fall smoothly from one's hand .
